item.title: Predictive Customer Segmentation Case Study | AI Marketing Consultant | 340% ROI
item.description: Discover how advanced customer segmentation using AI and machine learning increased revenue by 5.2% and marketing ROI by 340%. Real case study with measurable results from an independent AI consultant specializing in data-driven marketing transformation.
